thread.title: Apple voices opposition to security bill that gives government more power to spy on users
thread.title_full: Apple voices opposition to security bill that gives government more power to spy on users - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Apple voices opposition to security bill that gives government more power to spy on users
text: Apple this evening has continued its outspoken attitude when it comes to protection of user rights and privacy. The Washington Post reports that the company has spoken out against a controversial cybersecurity bill that, if passed, would give the government a variety of new powers to access user data. Supporters of the bill say that […] »
